CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Entitlement_Info__c ,'Entitled'),Delivery_System__c = 'Scratch Order via P20' , PO__c <> Null),HYPERLINK('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Scratch Order&mode=touchless&outputType=none', IMAGE("/resource/Scratch_Order","Scratch Order"),"_self"),null)
CustomField.label: Scratch Order
